revised_title: Investigations on the Impregnation of Ovum in Amphibia
tldr: The author investigates the process of ovum impregnation in amphibians, focusing on the role of spermatozoa and the conditions necessary for successful fertilization. Through a series of experiments, he proves the direct agency of spermatozoa in impregnation and examines the factors affecting this process, such as temperature and aeration.
